description: Classic dad joke, mixing hunger with wordplay.
title: Hungry Dad
n_1: Child looks frustrated, sitting at the empty dinner table.
n_2: Child rolls eyes, while Dad chuckles, pleased with his joke.
n_3: Child gives in, smiles at Dad's persistent humor.
n_4: Both share a light-hearted moment, enjoying the bond.
c2_4: And you’re the best audience, my child!
